description: A table of the level of care to and from dates for prior Medicare stays.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: LOC_PRIOR_STAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The level of care for a date range of a prior hospital stay.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Acute


SNF


ICF
